overview: Reno, a successful entrepreneur, loves Clara, his wife. One day, there is a new secretary, Tiara, who works in his office. One night Reno celebrate his friend’s birthday at a nightclub. Reno is drunk and having sex with Tiara. It turns out that Tiara records this incident and then squeezes Reno. Tiara asks Reno to divorce his wife and gives a month’s time. Tiara threatens to give the videotape to Clara.
title: Sang Sekretaris
